message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動、再度押すと解除
message.translation: Charge. Press the assigned button and wait for the charge to finish. To release, press again.

message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動
message.translation: Begin casting by pressing the assigned button, and release when the chant completes.

message.original: セットボタンを押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動、再度押すと解除
message.translation: Begin casting by pressing the assigned button, release it when the chant completes, and press the assigned button again to cancel.
